senses.de: Unsure or slow to act because you feel unsure or nervous
senses.ex: She was hesitant about agreeing to the deal

Tips.title: Emotional Uncertainty
Tips.description: Use 'hesitant' to express feelings of mixed emotions or internal doubts when making decisions.
Tips.example: She was hesitant to accept the promotion, fearing the increased responsibility.

Tips.title: In Decision-Making
Tips.description: 'Hesitant' describes someone who delays choosing because they're uncertain about the outcomes.
Tips.example: I'm hesitant to invest in that stock because I don't have enough information.

Tips.title: Social Situations
Tips.description: In social contexts, being 'hesitant' can show politeness or reluctance to offend others.
Tips.example: He seemed hesitant to criticize her cooking, despite not liking it.

senses.de: Tending to stop, pause, or wait before doing something, especially because you are unsure or nervous
senses.ex: He gave me a hesitant smile

Tips.title: Initial Interactions
Tips.description: 'Hesitant' often describes first reactions, such as a smile or handshake, when meeting someone new.
Tips.example: His hesitant handshake suggested he was not confident.

Tips.title: Body Language
Tips.description: 'Hesitant' can be used to describe non-verbal cues that show someone is uncomfortable or unsure.
Tips.example: Her hesitant nod made me think she didn't fully agree.

Tips.title: Voice Tone
Tips.description: A 'hesitant' tone of voice indicates uncertainty or lack of confidence in spoken communication.
Tips.example: He answered in a hesitant voice, which made me doubt if he was telling the truth.

Ambivalent.wordDefinition:
Ambivalent means to have mixed feelings or conflicting emotions about something. For example, if you are ambivalent about a decision, you might feel both excited and scared at the same time.

Ambivalent describes conflicting emotions while hesitant describes uncertainty or reluctance.

Certain.wordDefinition:
Certain means having no doubt or being confident about something. It is applicable when you are completely sure about something and have no confusion or hesitation in your mind.

For example, "I am certain that I locked the door before leaving the house."

Doubtful.wordDefinition:
Doubtful means having uncertainty or being unsure about something. It is applicable when you are unsure about whether something is true or not, or whether to believe or trust someone.

For example, "I am doubtful about his story."

Indecisive.wordDefinition:
Indecisive means to have difficulty making a decision or making up your mind. This could be applicable in situations where you may not be sure what the best choice is or feel overwhelmed by options.

In essence, hesitant implies that you know what to do but are cautious, whereas indecisive implies that you are unsure of what to do.

Reluctant.wordDefinition:
Reluctant means to be unwilling, resistant or hesitant in doing something. It's used when a person has strong doubts or is unwilling to do something.

For example, if someone is reluctant to join a new sports team, they may have a fear of failing, or they are unwilling to dedicate the necessary time and effort required.

Tentative.wordDefinition:
Tentative means to be cautious and uncertain about something. It is applicable when someone is exploring or trying something new, and is not yet fully committed or confident in their abilities.

Hesitant is used when someone is unsure about what to do, while tentative is used when someone is trying something new and not yet fully confident.

Unwilling.wordDefinition:
Hesitant means to feel unsure or uncertain about something, while unwilling means to be opposed to doing something.

If someone is unwilling to try a new food, it means they have made up their mind that they do not want to try it, even if they have never tried it before.

Hesitant is used when someone is unsure or lacks confidence, while unwilling is used when someone actively resists or opposes something.

quotes.Text: I remember when I told my mom that I wanted to come out, and my mom was a little hesitant. She was saying, 'Are you sure? Do you think that might affect your scores?' or, 'Is it something that you think that you need to do?' And I told her, 'I don't care. It's important to me.
quotes.Title: American Athlete
quotes.Name: Adam Rippon

quotes.Text: I'm hesitant to ever take on the crest of the veteran. So I don't know who I am to warn the younger writer about the perils to come. I think maybe the most dangerous influence is to think you have all the answers and should be giving counsel.
quotes.Title: American Writer
quotes.Name: Rachel Kushner

quotes.Text: I wanted to do 'Kanchana' in Hindi but many heroes I approached were hesitant to act with the saree and also demanded that the climax song be removed completely. I wrote the script with such passion that I could not agree for any compromise.
quotes.Name: Raghava Lawrence

quotes.Text: I'm a bit hesitant to do anything because I'm actually kind of lazy and I'd like an easier life from now on. The world's a massive place with lots of early mornings and late starts when you're working.
quotes.Title: British Musician
quotes.Name: Robbie Williams

quotes.Text: HIV AIDS is a disease with stigma. And we have learned with experience, not just with HIV AIDS but with other diseases, countries for many reasons are sometimes hesitant to admit they have a problem.
quotes.Title: Chinese Public Servant
quotes.Name: Margaret Chan

quotes.Text: The first book was a life story that I was hesitant to write anyway because I didn't feel like I had a real life story... It was a surprise hit.
quotes.Title: American Entertainer
quotes.Name: Bobby Bones

quotes.Text: It took me a long time to even dare to envision myself as a writer. I was very uncertain and hesitant and afraid to pursue a creative life.
quotes.Title: American Author
quotes.Name: Jhumpa Lahiri

quotes.Text: You can't create more jobs for an economy where the vast majority of people are hesitant and even afraid to spend and buy.
quotes.Title: American Psychologist
quotes.Name: Mark Goulston

quotes.Text: I was hesitant to ask around for work, so I did a short film called 'Bulbul,' which was praised a lot by people.
quotes.Title: Indian Actress
quotes.Name: Divya Khosla Kumar

quotes.Text: Bing was always hesitant to accept appreciation in any form.
quotes.Title: American Musician
quotes.Name: Bob Crosby
